name: Kanye West
description: Kanye West is a Grammy Award-winning rapper and record producer and fashion designer.

name: Mark Zuckerberg
description: Co-founder and CEO of the social-networking website Facebook, as well as one of the world's youngest billionaires.

name: Cristina Fernández de Kirchner
description: Ms Fernández took over the presidency in 2007, succeeding her late husband Nestor Kirchner.

name: Malala Yousafzai
description: She is a human rights activist who advocates for the rights of women and girls and worldwide access to education.
